data.title: Stockdale High School, CA Homes for Sale
data.meta_description: Instantly search and view photos of all homes for sale near Stockdale High School, CA now. Real estate listings updated every 15 to 30 minutes.

Biggest Lot on the Block!!  Welcome to a move-in ready 3 bedroom 2 bath home that sits on a 11,160 sq ft lot. Great family living home located in a cul de sac walking distance to Sing Lum Elementary School and Campus Park South. The home has a nice size living room with a fireplace. The kitchen opens up to a dining area and cozy family room. There's even an indoor laundry room next to the 2 car attached garage. If you need a property that can provide a secured space for your boat, your RV, your outdoor vehicles or even work trucks then this is the home for you.
